description: Remove str() from message formatting code, example: "Error %s" % str(x), because %s conversion converts any Python object using str()
title: Remove str() from message formating block

comments.content: Remove str() from message formatting code, example: "Error %s" % str(x), because %s conversion converts any Python object using str()
